text: Crush is the seventh studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and was released June 13, 2000 through Mercury Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Austria, Belgium, the Netherlands, Finland, Germany, Italy, Scotland, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. It also went to number 9 in the United States. It was nominated for 2 Grammy Awards in 2001. == Track listing == *At the end of the album, the band can be heard discussing what would happen if James Brown were there, which then follows into 30 seconds of silence before a bonus track, "I Could Make a Living Out of Loving You", can be heard. == References == Category:2000 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: Crush (Bon Jovi album)
